api_list.api_description: Retrieves a specific entry given its name or ID.

required_parameters.name: entry
required_parameters.description: The name or ID of the entry.

optional_parameters.name: game
optional_parameters.description: The game version to query; defaults to 'botw'.

api_list.api_description: Returns whether a given number is even.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number you want to check.

query: Can you tell me if the ID number 10 for a Hyrule Compendium entry refers to an even number and what entry it corresponds to?
